description: Fetches emails from Gmail and starts the workflow on specified polling intervals.

properties.name: simple
properties.description: Whether to return a simplified version of the response instead of the raw data

properties.name: filters
properties.description: Whether to include messages from SPAM and TRASH in the results

options.name: includeSpamTrash
options.description: Whether to include messages from SPAM and TRASH in the results

options.name: includeDrafts
options.description: Whether to include email drafts in the results

properties.name: options
properties.description: Prefix for name of the binary property to which to write the attachment. An index starting with 0 will be added. So if name is 'attachment_' the first attachment is saved to 'attachment_0'.

options.name: dataPropertyAttachmentsPrefixName
options.description: Prefix for name of the binary property to which to write the attachment. An index starting with 0 will be added. So if name is 'attachment_' the first attachment is saved to 'attachment_0'.

options.name: downloadAttachments
options.description: Whether the email's attachments will be downloaded
